name: adguardhome-sync
description: AdGuardHome Sync automatically synchronizes exact config and filter settings across multiple AdGuard Home instances. It helps users running multi-router or distributed setups manage consistent filtering rules without manual effort.
features: Automatic Sync: Keep all AdGuard Home instances perfectly synchronized. Set it and forget it.
Unified Configuration: Filtering rules and settings replicate across all servers. One change, everywhere updated.
Multi-Location Support: Perfect for homes or businesses with multiple routers. Consistent protection everywhere.
Effortless Management: Maintain uniform ad blocking without manual updates. Save time and effort.
Scheduled Updates: Configure automatic synchronization on your preferred schedule. Runs when you want.
Flexible Modes: Choose one-way replication or bidirectional sync as needed. Adapt to your setup.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage with straightforward deployment. Won't slow down your system.
Cross-Platform: Works seamlessly across different operating systems. Universal compatibility.
